کمبینٹوریل آپٹیمائزیشن کمپیوٹر سائنس کی: What is combinatorial optimization in computer science? Combinatorial optimization branch of computer science

From a computer science perspective, combinatorial optimization seeks to improve an algorithm by using mathematical methods either to reduce the size of the set of possible solutions or to make the search itself faster.
What is combinatorial optimization in computer science? Combinatorial optimization branch of computer science

Combinatorial optimization is related to operations research, algorithm theory, and computational complexity theory. It has important applications in several fields, including artificial intelligence, machine learning, auction theory, software engineering, VLSI, applied mathematics and theoretical computer science.
